description: ***ALL ESTATE TREES***T19	Cherry (Prunus spp)	After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in good condition with no history of major pruning. But some minor tree overhangs drive and entry lamp. Reduce overhang to drive by 2m and overhang to lamp by 1m.T20	Common Lime (Tilia x europaea) After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in good condition with history of regular pollarding. Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 2-3m of new growth. Final height 5m and spread 3m.T21	Common Lime (Tilia x europaea) After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in good condition with history of regular pollarding. Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 2-3m of new growth. Final height 5m and spread 3m.T22	Common Lime (Tilia x europaea) After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in good condition with history of regular pollarding. Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 2-3m of new growth. Final height 5m and spread 3m.T23	Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus)	After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in good condition with history of regular pollarding. Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 1-1.5m of new growth. Final height 5m and spread 6m.T29	Mimosa (Acacia dealbata) After ground based observation, this tree appears to be in reasonable condition with no history of major pruning. But the crown is quite top heavy and these trees are shallow rooted and this tree is in a limited space raised bed. Reduce crown by 30%. Removing 2m - final height 6m and final spread 4m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
